Catholic Church. Pope (1700-1721 : Clement XI)
metadata.title: Declaration du roy, qui suspend toutes les disputes, contestations & differends qui se sont formez dans le royaume

France
France. Parlement (Toulouse)
France. Sovereign (1715-1774 : Louis XV)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 3 no. 82
metadata.description: Caption title. Imprint and imprint date at foot of p. 4
The Constitution referred to is the Papal bull Unigenitus
The Reflexions morales is part of Quesnel's French translation of the New Testament
"Prononcé à Toulouse en Parlement, le 27. octobre 1717."

An effort to suppress the disputes occasioned by Pope Clement XI's bull Unigenitus, condemning 101 Jansenist propostions in p. Quesnel's Le Nouveau Testament en françois, avec des reflexions morales sur chaque verset
